author: stoddard
msg: More sendfile work. Use new sendfile API in Apache, update Windows MPM
to begin using APR socket API.
sendfile on Unix side is broken. Need to detect for NULL hdtr. I'll do
it later this week if no one else steps up.

author: rbb
msg: We need to know if a platform has fork or not.

author: bjh
msg: timetaken is expected to be in milliseconds, not seconds.

author: stoddard
msg: Begin migrating Windows to use APR sockets. Clean-up sendfile a bit more.

author: stoddard
msg: Fix a couple of bugs in the Unix side of the house. Not tested (no machine available).
First bug: Use ap_sendv to implement iol_writev. The previous implementation would
only send the first buffer in the chain.
Second bug: ap_sendfile() on HP needs to put all the headers (trailers) into a single
header (trailer) buffer. The data was not being copied into the buffers correctly.
